replies.body: Where is Dragon Slayer Swain as promised years ago? {{champion:50}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

pls its been years since a Swain skin
Logged in just to tell you guys that Yorick hasn't had a new skin since his release 5 1/2 years ago
What this guy said! We got an update to Yorick finally but no skin?!?! Common Riot!!!

you mean, the coolest skin idea for Yorick would be crazy cat lady Yorick.
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=769430

Just logged in to up-vote these two posts about Yorick! As a halfassed main of the one and only Papa Raidboss I would highly appreciate a new skin as well. Would spend all the monies on a new Yorick skin that doesn't follow the Bloodmoon/Project fad going on right now. Something like Fallen Knight Yorick, where he is covered in shattered pieces of armor, or a cool sounding skin like Shade Seed Yorick, where he could be part of the fallen isles sorcerer cult. He could even continue on the "Deep Sea" thresh skin and be another drowned hero who summons a Kraken! You're creative Rito! We, all the Yorick fans, are counting on you.

And the update was really awesome for him.  I always wondered why Riot likes to make skins out the ying yang for certain champions but leave ones like Yorick, Illaoi, Ivern(just to name a few)with only 1-3 skins.

All three of them have a lot of skin potential, which makes it worse that they have so few.  Being an Ivern main myself, I'd love a small chroma pack for the four seasons, as well as Elderwood Ivern, Groovy Ivern, Professor Ivern, and Gentleman Ivern.  Make it happen Riot!
Faker is about to have more skins than Yorick XD

how did u get xin to walk like that
can we do that too?

We created a custom animation for Xin's walk, but it's only for the trailer. To be clear, it doesn't appear in-game (and wouldn't make sense anyway since you either run or (in some cases) stagger from slows).
Kind of sad because I like that walk animation. Even for the spawn animation when you first start the match have him walking into the fountain like that would of been enough for us to be happy.
logged in to upvote. this is true
logged in to upvote, this is true
So what you're saying is that we can't walk this way?
Can we talk this way?
You should absolutely include it in-game somehow.  Perhaps a special emote that toggles on the 'swag walk" until either you toggle it off or enter combat.
Maybe you guys can make it something like yasuo's animation where he sheaths his sword after a moment of not attacking. It's similar to j4's normal walk so I think it can easily be added in game.
All these new skins and I'm still here waiting for Dragon Master {{champion:50}}

Where's the link to download the zyra skin wall paper? They did that for arcade ahri >~<
If you click on the Dragon Sorceress image, a window will pop-up. Right-click to download :)
can we get a 1920x1080 version of Dragonslayer Jarvan IV?
The Dragonslayer J4 wallpaper is a bit older than most of the high resolution wallpapers we publish now. Hope that makes sense, sorry that we don't have one for you in this case.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ptrans,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=LzEA9zVG,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-03-09T19:33:00.577+0000)
>
> If you click on the Dragon Sorceress image, a window will pop-up. Right-click to download :)

Hey, I was just curious if you could help me.  See, I bought the new Dragon Sorceress Zyra skin and then an hour later, I unlocked the same skin from a chest.  Is there any way I can get a refund. I already spent my refund points, so that's why I'm messaging you for support. 
Thank you for your time! :D

Hi Le Him! Typically every player gets a few refunds on their account. However, with Hextech, there is a difference process I am not familiar with. BUT! Here is a guide on this ^_^ :

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide

Since your account information is sensitive, please submit a request here: https://support.riotgames.com/requests/new and a Rioter will be able to answer your questions there! Hope that helps! <3
